AutoLaunchDescription: Enable the automatic launch of the program when starting your computer
DisconnectDescription: Disconnect from Plex. Will immediately trigger the opening of the browser to reconnect
ElapsedModeDescription: Will show the elapsed time in Discord
EnableDevicesByDefaultDescription: Should new discovered devices be enabled by default
QuitDescription: Close the app and stop the rich presence from Plex
RemainingModeDescription: Will show the remaining in Discord
SignInNotificationDescription: You can now login in the browser window that just opened!
